title: Cliff Notes: WHAT DOES AMAZON'S STOCK SPLIT MEAN?

description:
In this Cliff Notes we spoke about Amazon’s pending stock split and what it means for investors. We also covered China’s recent stock crash. #stocks #amazon #investing
